title: XARF v4 Messaging - Bulk Messaging Type Schema
description: Schema for bulk messaging reports - legitimate but unwanted bulk communications

evidence_source.description: RECOMMENDED: Source of bulk messaging evidence

protocol.description: REQUIRED: Communication protocol used for bulk messaging

smtp_from.description: REQUIRED: SMTP envelope sender address (required when protocol=smtp)

sender_name.description: OPTIONAL: Display name of the sender

recipient_count.description: REQUIRED: Number of recipients (bulk requires minimum 100 recipients)

unsubscribe_provided.description: RECOMMENDED: Whether message provides unsubscribe mechanism

opt_in_evidence.description: OPTIONAL: Whether there is evidence of recipient opt-in

high_volume.description: OPTIONAL: High volume sending pattern detected

template_based.description: OPTIONAL: Message appears to be template-based

commercial_sender.description: OPTIONAL: Sender appears to be commercial entity

bulk_indicators.description: OPTIONAL: Indicators specific to bulk messaging detection
